Posts.Content: Dec 12, 2017 08:19PM Christina_E wrote: hi Stage IV, Diagnosed in 2008 (age 29) with Stage II IDC, restaged December 2009 Stage IV Mets to spine. ER/PR+, HER2-, All genetic mutation negative. Reoccurrence x6 Skin & breast tissue (2009), sternum (2012), thoracic spine (2009), skin & chest wall (2014), Mets to common bile duct, sternum, lymph nodes (July 2017), Mets to bone marrow (12/12/17).  Bilateral mastectomies, hysterectomy, TAC, Tamixifen, Femara, Afinitor Current treatment; Zometa, Faslodex & Ibrance Preparing for chemo & bone marrow transplant in jan 2018.
